name: Deck of Life: You Die If You Have No Cards In Your Hand
name_original: Deck of Life: You Die If You Have No Cards In Your Hand
description:
Deck of Life

A card battler where cards are your health. 

No turns, individual card permadeath. Construct defenses while launching projectiles to destroy your opponent's cards.

Beat enemies and events to win cards from unique card pools.

All cards can be attacked at any time with projectiles. If all your cards on the field are destroyed, you die.
